lines.transliteration_english: Ayk Hee Goras Mai Anayk Ras Ko Pragaasa , Dahiao Mahiao Maakhanu Au Ghrit Ounamaaneeai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: From milk alone several products like curd, butter milk, butter and ghee (clarified butter) are obtained;

lines.transliteration_english: Ayk Hee Oukhaaree Mai Mitthaas Ko Nivaas Gurhu , Khaand Misaree Au Kaleekand Pahichaaneeai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Being sweet, sugarcane gives us jaggery cakes, sugar, crystal sugar etc;

Shabad OS B.translation: Fire and water have specific traits but when three others (wheat flour, clarified butter and sugar) join with them, elixir like Karhah Parshad results. Similarly coming together of obedient and loyal Sikhs of the Guru in the form of a congregation is cons
